component.name: S&D - Search & Destroy
component.summary: A modern graphical interface for ClamAV antivirus scanning

description.p: S&D (Search & Destroy) is a user-friendly graphical interface for ClamAV, the popular open-source antivirus engine. It provides an intuitive way to scan files and directories for viruses, malware, and other threats.

ul.li: Easy-to-use interface for initiating scans
File and directory selection for targeted scanning
Detailed scan results with threat information
Configurable scanning options
Sandboxed execution for enhanced security
